text: Dr. Seuss' The Lorax is a 2012 American animated movie. It is based on Dr. Seuss' book of the same name. It stars Danny DeVito, Ed Helms, Zac Efron, Taylor Swift, Betty White, Rob Riggle and Jenny Slate. It was released on July 6, 2012. The movie received mixed reviews. It has songs like "Let it Grow" and "How Bad Can I Be". ==Plot== The story begins when a small teenager named Ted Wiggins appears. It ends when the Once-ler reunites with the Lorax. title: The Lorax (movie)
